text: Shell plc is a British multinational oil and gas company. It is a publicly traded company. They are headquartered at Shell Centre in London, United Kingdom. Shell is a public limited company. They are the largest gas and oil businessnes within the top 10 of the Fortune global 500 since 2000. Shell was the ninth-largest business producer of greenhouse gas emissions between 1988 until 2015. ==References== Category:Companies of the United Kingdom Category:Petrol companies
title: Shell plc
